title: FS: Brown Hindu Special - SGC low-grade
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: FS: Brown Hindu Special - SGC low-grade
posts.post_content:
Great deals on low-grade Brown Hindus, plus a nice non-Hindu Revelle and Schreck.  The Wiltse is open to offers.  Curse SGC for refusing to add 'Ghost' to the flip.

Prices are for check or money order.  Send inquires to lessdrama@gmail.com(NOT PM PLEASE)

T206 Kisinger, Rube - 2 factories on back PSA 3 VGPied 350 25PSA 3 VG$139.00
T206 Revelle, Dutch - SL’er PSA 4 VGEXPiedmontPSA 4 VGEX$179.00
T206 Brown, George (Chicago) PSA AuthenticHindu-BrownPSA Authentic$179.00
T206 Ellam, Roy (SL’er) PSA AuthenticHindu-BrownPSA Authentic$239.00
T206 Merkle, Fred (Portrait) PSA AuthenticHindu-BrownPSA Authentic$109.00
T206 Schreck, OssiePiedmontSGC 30$39.00

As stated in the original post, I am open to offers on the Wiltse.  I did not price it, because when I have in the past, there was no response.  I really am curious what people think its value is.   If there are several in the same range, I will certainly reconsider my earlier pricing.
